comments:
I20040617-2123
Get from HEAD, org.eclipse.platform-feature.
Go in the content page of the feature manfiest editor.
Some entries will be marked with a warning.
Select some of them, and try to delete. You'll get the following exception.

java.lang.ClassCastException
	at

	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.editor.plugin.MatchSection.selectionChanged(MatchSection.java:300)
	at org.eclipse.ui.forms.ManagedForm.fireSelectionChanged(ManagedForm.java:125)

sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)

Problem is with multiple-selection.  When we're selecting more than one feature
plugin, we're calling a selectionChanged method that assumes all selected items
are feature imports.

Solution:  If selected items are not feature imports, do nothing.

Fix is low-risk.

Wassim, please verify the patch I'm about to append.

Created an attachment (id=12528)
Patch for PDE UI

Per my comment above...

+1 from Dejan and I.

Patch looks and works great.

Just released patch.
